GV05brupsb1u:738: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā prajāpateḥ pūrvajanmāvasthasya vāci kṣiptaḥ sa eṣa pratyakṣīkriyate /
GV05brupsb1u:739: ko 'sau? yadevamapratirūpamananurūpaṃ śāstrapratiṣiddhaṃ vadati yena prayukto 'sabhyabībhatsānṛtādyanicchannapi vadati /
GV05brupsb1u:740: anena kāryeṇāpratirūpavadanena anugamyamānaḥ prajāpateḥ kāryabhūtāsu prajāsu vāci vartate
GV05brupsb1u:741: sa evāpratirūpavadanenānumitaḥ sa prajāpatervāci gataḥ pāpmā,
GV05brupsb1u:744: atha ha prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brupsb1u:746: yaḥ prāṇe bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brupsb1u:750: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ jighrati |
GV05brupsb1u:752: atha ha cakṣur ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brupsb1u:754: yaś cakṣuṣi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brupsb1u:758: sa yaḥ sa pāpmā yad evedam apratirūpaṃ paśyati |
GV05brupsb1u:760: atha ha śrotram ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brupsb1u:762: yaḥ śrotre bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brupsb1u:769: atha ha mana ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brupsb1u:771: yo manasi bhogas taṃ devebhya āgāyat |
GV05brupsb1u:778: evam u khalv etā devatāḥ pāpmabhir upāsṛjan |
GV05brupsb1u:780: BrhUpBh_1,3.3-6 tathaiva ghrāṇādidevatā udgīthanirvartatvājjapamantraprakāśyā upāsyāśceti kameṇa parīkṣitavantaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:786: vāgādideva, enāḥ pāpmanāvidhyanpāpmanā viddhavanta iti yaduktaṃ tatpāpmabhirupāsṛjanpāpmabhiḥ saṃsargaṃ kṛtavanta ityetat //3-6 //
GV05brupsb1u:787: vāgādidevatā upāsīnā api mṛtyatigamanāyāśaraṇāḥ santo devāḥ krameṇa-
GV05brupsb1u:789: atha hemam āsanyaṃ prāṇam ūcus tvaṃ na udgāyeti |
GV05brupsb1u:793: sa yathāśmānam ṛtvā loṣṭo vidhvaṃsetaivaṃ haiva vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco vineśuḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:795: bhavaty ātmanā, parāsya dviṣan bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ||
GV05brupsb1u:797: āsanyamāsye bhavamāsanyaṃ mukhāntarbilasthaṃ prāṇamūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brupsb1u:798: tathetyevaṃ śaraṇamupagatebhyaḥ sa eṣa prāṇo mukhya udagāyadityādi pūrvavat /
GV05brupsb1u:799: pāpmanāvivyatsanvedhanaṃ kartumiṣṭavantaste ca doṣāsaṃsargiṇaṃ santaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇam /
GV05brupsb1u:800: svena āsaṅgadoṣeṇa vāgādiṣu labdhaprasarāstadabhyāsānuvṛttyā saṃsrakṣyamāṇā vineśurvinaṣṭā vidhvastāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:801: kathamiva? iti dṛṣṭānta ucyate- sa yathā sa dṛṣṭānto yathā loke 'śmānaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:802: pāṣāṇamṛtvā gatvā prāpya, loṣṭaḥ pāṃsupiṇḍaḥ pāṣāṇacūrṇanāyāśmani
GV05brupsb1u:803: nikṣiptaḥ svayaṃ vidhvaṃseta vistraṃseta vicūrṇībhavet, evaṃ haiva yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta evameva, vidhvaṃsamānā viśeṣeṇa dhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco nānāgatayo vineśurvinaṣṭā yataḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:804: tatastasmādāsuravināśāddevatvapratibandhabhūtebhyaḥ svābhāvikāsaṅgajanitapāpmabhyo viyogād asaṃsargadharmimukhyaprāṇāśrayabalād devā vāgādayaḥ prakṛtā abhavat /
GV05brupsb1u:806: pūrvamaṣyagnyādyātmana eva santaḥ svābhāvikena pāpmanā tiraskṛtavijñānāḥ piṇḍamātrābhimānā āsan /
GV05brupsb1u:811: etāmevākhyāyikārūpāṃ śrutiṃ dṛṣṭvā tenaiva krameṇa vāgādidevatāḥ parīkṣya,
GV05brupsb1u:812: tāścāpohyāsaṅgapāpmāspadadoṣavattvenādoṣāspadaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇamātmatvenopagamya vāgādyādhyātmikapiṇḍamātraparicchinnātmābhimānaṃ hitvā vairājapiṇḍābhimānaṃ vāgādyagnyādyātmaviṣayaṃ vartamānaprajāpatitvaṃ śāstraprakāśitaṃ pratipannaḥ, tathaivāyaṃ yajamānastenaiva vidhinā bhavati prajāpatisvarūpeṇātmanā /
GV05brupsb1u:813: parā cāsyā prajāpatitvapratipakṣabhūtaḥ pāpmā dviṣanbhrātṛvyo bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:819: phalamupasaṃhṛtyādhunākhyāyikārūpamevāśrityāha- kasmāccahetorvāgādīnmuktā mukhya eva prāṇa ātmatvenāśrayitavyaḥ? iti tadupapattinirūpaṇāya yasmādayaṃ vāgādīnāṃ piṇḍādīnāṃ ca sādhāraṇa ātmā,
GV05brupsb1u:822: te hocuḥ -- kva nu so 'bhūd yo na ittham asakteti |
GV05brupsb1u:825: BrhUpBh_1,3.8 te prajāpatiprāṇā mukhyena prāṇena pariprāpitadevasvarūpā hocuruktavantaḥ phalāvasthāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:831: katham? ayamāsye 'ntariti, āsye mukhe ya ākāśastasminnantarayaṃ pratyakṣo vartata iti /
GV05brupsb1u:832: sarvo hi loko vicāryādhyavasyati, tathā devāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:833: yasmādayamantarākāśe vāgādyātmatvena viśeṣamanāśritya vartamāna upalabdho devaiḥ, tasmātsaprāṇo 'yāsyo viśeṣānāśrayācca asakta sañjitavānvāgādīn /
GV05brupsb1u:835: kathamāṅgirasaḥ? prasiddhaṃ hyetadaṅgānāṃ kāryakaraṇalakṣaṇānāṃ rasaḥ sāra ātmetyarthaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:838: viśuddhaśca, tasmādvāgādīnapāsya prāṇa evātmatvenāśrayitavya iti vākyārthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:842: vāḍham, kiṃ tvāṅgirasatvena vāgādīnāmātmatvoktyā vāgādidvāreṇa śavasṛṣṭitatspṛṣṭerivāśuddhatā śaṅkyate- ityāha- śuddha eva praṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:845: sā vā eṣā devatā dūr nāma |
GV05brupsb1u:847: dūraṃ ha vā asmān mṛtyur bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.9 ||
GV05brupsb1u:848: BrhUpBh_1,3.9 sā vā eṣā devatā dūrnāma /
GV05brupsb1u:849: yaṃ prāṇaṃ prāpyāśmānamiva loṣṭavadvidhvastā asurāstaṃ parāmṛśati seti /
GV05brupsb1u:852: devatā ca sā syāt, upāsanakriyāyāḥ karmabhāvena guṇabhūtatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:856: kutaḥ punardūrnāmatvam? ityāha- dūraṃ dūreḥ hi yasmādasyāḥ prāṇadevatāyāḥ mṛtyurāsaṅgalakṣaṇaḥ pāpmā /
GV05brupsb1u:857: asaṃśleṣadharmitvātprāṇasya samīpasthāsyāpi dūratā mṛtyostasmād dūrityevaṃ khyātiḥ, evaṃ prāṇasya viśuddhirjñāpitā /
GV05brupsb1u:858: viduṣaḥ phalamucyate- dūraṃ ha vā asmānmṛtyurbhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:859: asmādevaṃvidaḥ, ya evaṃ veda tasmādevamiti prakṛtaṃ viśuddhiguṇopetaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:861: upāsanaṃ nāma upāsyārthavāde yathā devatādisvarūpaṃ śrutyā jñāpyate tathā manasopagamya āsanaṃ cintanaṃ laukikapratyayāvyavadhānena yāvattaddevatādisvarūpātmābhimānābhivyaktiriti laukikātmābhimānavat “devo bhūtvā devānapyeti” (bṛ.u.4 /
GV05brupsb1u:865: sā vā eṣā devatā dūraṃ ha vā asmānmṛtyurbhavatītyuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:866: kathaṃ punarevaṃvido dūraṃ mṛtyurbhavati? ityucyate- evaṃvittvavirodhāt /
GV05brupsb1u:867: indriyaviṣayasaṃsargāsaṅgajo hi pāpmā prāṇātmābhimānino hi virudhyate,
GV05brupsb1u:870: tasmādevaṃvidaḥ pāpmā dūraṃ bhavatīti yuktaṃ virodhāt /
GV05brupsb1u:873: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatya yatrāsāṃ diśām antas tad gamayāṃ cakāra |
GV05brupsb1u:875: tasmān na janam iyān nāntam iyān net pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum anvavāyānīti ||
GV05brupsb1u:877: etāsāṃ vāgādīnāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyuṃ svābhāvikājñānaprayuktendriyaviṣayasaṃsargāsaṅgajanitena hi pāpmanā sarvo
GV05brupsb1u:878: mriyate, sa hyato mṛtyuḥ, taṃ prāṇātmābhimānamātratayaiva prāṇo
GV05brupsb1u:880: virodhādeva tu pāpmaivaṃvido dūraṃ gato bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:881: kiṃ punaścakāra devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyumapahatya? ityucyate- yatra yasminnāsāṃ prācyādīnāṃ diśāmanto 'vasānaṃ tattatra gamayāñcakāra gamanaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:883: nanu nāsti diśāmantaḥ kathamantaṃ gamitavān? ityucyate-
GV05brupsb1u:884: śrautavijñānavajjanāvadhinimittakalpitatvāddiśāṃ tadvirodhijanāvyuṣita eva deśo diśāmantaḥ, deśānto 'raṇyamiti yadvadityadoṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:885: tattatra gamayitvā āsāṃ devatānām, pāpmana iti dvitīyābahuvacanam,
GV05brupsb1u:890: tatsaṃsarge pāpmanā saṃsargaḥ kṛtaḥ syātpāpmāśrayo hi saḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:891: tajjananivāsaṃ cāntaṃ digantaśabdavācyaṃ neyājjanaśūnyamapi, janamapi taddeśaviyuktamityabhiprāyaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:894: anu ava ayānītyanugaccheyamiti, evaṃ bhīto na janamantaṃ ceyāditi pūrveṇa
GV05brupsb1u:897: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatyāthainā mṛtyum atyavahat || BrhUp_1,3.11
GV05brupsb1u:898: BrhUpBh_1,3.11 sā vā eṣā devatā, tadetatprāṇātmajñānakarmaphalaṃ vāgādīnāmagnyādyātmatvamucyate
GV05brupsb1u:899: athainā mṛtyumatyavahat tasmādādhyātmikaparicchedakaraḥ pāpmā mṛtyuḥ prāṇātmavijñānenapahatastasmātsaprāṇo 'pahantā pāpmano mṛtyoḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:900: tasmātsa eva prāṇa enā vāgādidevatāḥ prakṛtaṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyumatītya avahatprāpayatsvaṃ svamaparicchinnamagnyādidevātātmarūpam
GV05brupsb1u:902: sā vai vācam eva prathamām atyavahat |
GV05brupsb1u:903: sā yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata so 'gnir abhavat |
GV05brupsb1u:904: so 'yam agniḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto dīpyate || BrhUp_1,3.12 ||
GV05brupsb1u:909: tasyāḥ punarmṛtyumatītyoḍhāyāḥ kiṃ rūpam? ityucyate- sā vāgyadā yasminkāle
GV05brupsb1u:916: idānīṃ tu mṛtyuṃ pareṇa dīpyate mṛtyuviyogāt //12//
GV05brupsb1u:919: sa yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa vāyur abhavat |
GV05brupsb1u:920: so 'yaṃ vāyuḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntaḥ pavate || BrhUp_1,3.13 ||
GV05brupsb1u:926: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa ādityo 'bhavat |
GV05brupsb1u:927: so 'sāv ādityaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntas tapati || BrhUp_1,3.14 ||
GV05brupsb1u:931: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata tā diśo 'bhavan |
GV05brupsb1u:932: tā imā diśaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntāḥ || BrhUp_1,3.15 ||
GV05brupsb1u:937: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa candramā abhavat |
GV05brupsb1u:938: so 'sau candraḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto bhāti |
GV05brupsb1u:939: evaṃ ha vā enam eṣā devatā mṛtyum ativahati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.16
GV05brupsb1u:941: yathā pūrvayajamānaṃ vāgādyagnyādibhāvena mṛtyumatyavahat, evamenaṃ vartamānayajamānamapi ha vā eṣā prāṇadevatā mṛtyumativahati vāgādyagnyādibhāvena /
GV05brupsb1u:946: yad dhi kiñcānnam adyate 'nenaiva tad adyate |
GV05brupsb1u:948: BrhUpBh_1,3.17 yathā vāgādibhirātmārthamāgānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā mukhyo 'pi
GV05brupsb1u:949: prāṇaḥ sarvaprāṇasādhāraṇaṃ prājāpatyaphalamāgānaṃ kṛtvā triṣu pamāneṣu,
GV05brupsb1u:950: athānantaraṃ śiṣṭeṣu navasu, stotreṣu, ātmane ātmārthamannādyamannaṃ ca
GV05brupsb1u:957: ana iti prāṇasyākhyā prasiddhā anaḥ śabdaḥ sāntaḥ śakaṭavācī, yastvanyaḥ svarāntaḥ sa prāṇaparyāyaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:959: kiñca na kevalaṃ prāṇenādyata evānnādyam, tasmiñcharīrākārapariṇate
GV05brupsb1u:962: yadapi prāṇenānnādanaṃ tadapi pratiṣṭhārthameveti na vāgādiṣviva kalyāṇasaṅgajapātmasambhavaḥ prāṇe 'sti //17//
GV05brupsb1u:963: nanvavadhāraṇamayuktaṃ prāṇenaiva tadadyata iti, vāgādīnāmapi annanimittopakāradarśanāt /
GV05brupsb1u:968: etāvad vā idaṃ sarvaṃ yad annam |
GV05brupsb1u:973: tasmād yad anenānnam atti tenaitās tṛpyanti |
GV05brupsb1u:974: evaṃ ha vā enaṃ svā abhisaṃviśanti bhartā svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavaty annādo 'dhipatir ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brupsb1u:975: ya u haivaṃvidaṃ sveṣu pratir bubhūṣati na haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati |
GV05brupsb1u:976: atha ya evaitam anubhavati yo vaitam anu bhāryān bubhūrṣati sa haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati BrhUpBh_1,3.18 te vāgādayo devāḥ, svaviṣayadyotanāddevāḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:979: idaṃ tatsarvametāvadeva, kim? yadannaṃ prāṇasthitikaramadyate loke
GV05brupsb1u:982: ato 'nu paścānnosmānasminnanne ātmārthe tavānne ābhajasva ābhājayasva /
GV05brupsb1u:985: itara āha- te yūyaṃ yadyannārthino vai, mā māmabhisaṃviśata samantato
GV05brupsb1u:987: ityevamuktavati prāṇe tathetyevamiti, taṃ prāṇaṃ pariveṣṭya niviṣṭavanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:988: tathā niviṣṭānāṃ prāṇānujñayā teṣāṃ prāṇe naivādyamānaṃ prāṇasthitikaraṃ sadannaṃ tṛptikaraṃ bhavati na svātantryeṇa /
GV05brupsb1u:990: tadeva cāha- tasmādyasmātprāṇāśrayatayaiva prāṇānujñayābhisanniviṣṭā vāgādidevatāḥ tasmādyadannamanena prāṇenātti lokastenānnenaitā vāgādyāstṛpyanti /
GV05brupsb1u:991: vāgādyāśrayaṃ prāṇaṃ yo veda vāgādayaśca pañca prāṇāśrayā iti tamapyevamevaṃ ha vai svā jñātasya abhisaṃviśanti vāgādaya iva prāṇam /
GV05brupsb1u:993: abhisanniviṣṭānāṃ ca svānāṃ prāṇavadeva vāgādīnāṃ svānnena bhartā bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:994: tathā śreṣṭhaḥ puro 'grata etā gantā bhavati vāgādīnāmiva prāṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:996: adhipatiradhiṣṭhāya ca pālayitā svatantraḥ patiḥ prāṇavadeva vāgādīnām /
GV05brupsb1u:997: ya evaṃ prāṇaṃ veda tasyaitadyathoktaṃ phalaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:998: kiñca ya u haivaṃvidhaṃ prāṇavidaṃ prati sveṣu jñātīnāṃ madhye pratiḥ pratikūlo bubhūrṣati pratispardhī bhavitumicchati, sosurā iva,
GV05brupsb1u:999: prāṇapratispardhino na haivālaṃ na paryāpto bhāryebhyo bharaṇīyebhyo bhavati bhartumityarthaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:1000: atha punarya evaṃ jñātīnāṃ madhye evaṃvidaṃ vāgādaya iva prāṇam anu anugato bhavati, yo vaitamevaṃvidamanvevānuvartayanneva
GV05brupsb1u:1003: sa haivālaṃ paryāpto bhāryebhyo bharaṇīyebhyo bhavati bhartuṃ netaraḥ svatantraḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:1010: anantaraṃ ca vāgādīnāṃ prāṇādhīnatoktā sā ca kathamupapādanīyā? ityāha-
GV05brupsb1u:1015: tasmād yasmāt kasmāccāṅgāt prāṇa utkrāmati tad eva tac chuṣyati |
GV05brupsb1u:1016: eṣa hi vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ || BrhUp_1,3.19 ||
GV05brupsb1u:1018: uttarārtham'prāṇo vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ'ityevamantaṃ vākyaṃ yathāvyākhyārthameva punaḥ smārayati
GV05brupsb1u:1025: yasmādyato 'vayavātkasmādanuktaviśeṣāt, yasmātkasmādyataḥ kutaścicca aṅgāccharīrāvayavādaviśeṣitātprāṇa utkrāmatyapasarpati tadeva tatraiva tadaṅgaṃ śuṣyati nīrasaṃ bhavati śoṣamupaiti /
GV05brupsb1u:1026: tasmādeṣa hi vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ ityupasaṃhāraḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:1028: ātmāpāye hi śeṣo maraṇaṃ syāttasmāttena jīvanti prāṇinaḥ sarve /
GV05brupsb1u:1031: kiṃ tarhi? ṛgyajuḥsāmnāṃ nāmabhūtānāmātmeti sarvātmakatayā prāṇaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:1036: tasyā eṣa patis tasmād u bṛhaspatiḥ || BrhUp_1,3.20 ||
GV05brupsb1u:1037: BrhUpBh_1,3.20 eṣa u eva prakṛta āṅgiraso bṛhaspatiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:1038: kathaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ? ityucyate- vāgvai bṛhatī bṛhatīcchandaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:1046: “prāṇo bṛhatī prāṇa ṛca ityeva vidyāt”iti śrutyantarāt /

GV05brupsb1u:2392: tasmād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaṃ adhastād upāste rājasūye |
GV05brupsb1u:2395: tasmād yady api rājā paramatāṃ gacchati brahmaivāntata upaniśrayati svāṃ yonim |
GV05brupsb1u:2396: ya u enaṃ hinasti svāṃ sa yonim ṛcchati |
GV05brupsb1u:2397: sa pāpīyān bhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvā || BrhUp_1,4.11 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2409: iha tu sa evāmidhīyate 'viduṣaḥ karmādhikārahetupradarśanāya- brahma vā idamagra āsīdyadagniṃ sṛṣṭvā agnirūpāpannaṃ brahma /
GV05brupsb1u:2413: tadbrahmaikaṃ kṣatrādiparipālayitrādiśūnyaṃ sadaṃ na vyabhavat- na
GV05brupsb1u:2415: tatastadbrahma'brāhmaṇo 'smi mametthaṃ kartavyam'iti brāhmaṇajātinimittaṃ karma cikīrṣu-ātmanaḥ karmakartṛtvavibhūtyai śreyorūpaṃ praśastarūpam
GV05brupsb1u:2418: pradarśayati-yānyetāni prasiddhāni loke devatrā deveṣu kṣatrāṇīti /
GV05brupsb1u:2419: jātyākhyāyāṃ pakṣe bahuvacanasmaraṇād vyaktibahutvādvā bhedopacāreṇa bahuvacanam /
GV05brupsb1u:2420: kāni punastāni? ityāhatatrābhipiktā eva viśeṣato nirdiśyante-indro devānāṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2421: rājā, varuṇo yādasām, somo brāhmaṇānām, rudraḥ paśūnām, parjanyo
GV05brupsb1u:2427: yasmādbrahmaṇātiśayena sṛṣṭaṃ kṣatraṃ tasmātkṣatrātparaṃ nāsti brāhmaṇajāterapi niyansṛ /
GV05brupsb1u:2430: kṣatra eva tadātmīyaṃ yaśaḥ khyātirūpaṃ brahmeti dadhāti sthāpayati /
GV05brupsb1u:2431: rājasūyābhiṣiktenāsandyāṃ sthitena rājñā āmantrito brahmanniti ṛtvikpunastaṃ pratyāha”tvaṃ rājanbrahmāsi”iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2434: tasmādyadyati rājā paramatāṃ rājasūyābhiṣekaguṇaṃ gacchatyāpnoti brahmaiva
GV05brupsb1u:2435: brāhmaṇajātimedha, antato 'nte karmaparisamāptāvupanikṣayatyāśrayati svāṃ yonim, purohitaṃ puro nidhatta ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2436: yastu punarbalābhimānātsvāṃ yoniṃ brāhmaṇajātiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ya u enaṃ hinasti hiṃsati nyagbhāvena paśyati, svāmātmāyāmeva sa yonimṛcchati-svaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2437: prasavaṃ vicchinatti vināśayati-svaṃ prasavaṃ vicchinatti vināśayati /
GV05brupsb1u:2439: pūrvamapi kṣatriyaḥ pāpa eva krūratvādātmaprasavahiṃsayā sutarām /
GV05brupsb1u:2440: yathā loke śreyāṃsaṃ praśastataraṃ hiṃsitvā paribhūya pāpataro bhavati tadvat //11//
GV05brupsb1u:2445: yāny etāni devajātāni gaṇaśa ākhyāyante vasavo rudrā ādityā viśve devā maruta iti || BrhUp_1,4.12
GV05brupsb1u:2446: BrhUpBh_1,4.12 sa naiva vyabhavat, karmaṇe brahma tathā navyabhavat,
GV05brupsb1u:2449: kaḥ punarasau viṭ? yānyetāni devajātāni-svārthe niṣṭhā, ya ete devajātibhedā ityarthaḥ;gaṇaśo gaṇaṃ gaṇam, ākhyāyante kathyante /
GV05brupsb1u:2450: gaṇaprāyā hi viśaḥ, prāyeṇa saṃhatā hi vittopārjane samarthāḥ na ekaikaśaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:2451: vasavaḥ aṣṭasaṅkhyo gaṇaḥ, tathaikādaśa rudrāḥ, dvādaśādityāḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2452: viśvedevāsrayodaśa viśvāyā apatyāni, sarve vā devāḥ, marutaḥ sapta sapta
GV05brupsb1u:2458: iyaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ puṣyati yad idaṃ kiñca || BrhUp_1,4.13 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2459: BrhUpBh_1,4.13 sa paricārakabhāvātpunarapi naiva vyabhavat, sa śaudraṃ varṇamasṛjata- śūdra eva śaudraḥ, svārthe 'ṇi vṛddhiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2460: kaḥ punarasau śaudro varṇo yaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ? pūṣaṇam- puṇyatīti pūṣā kaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:2461: punarasau pūṣā? iti viśeṣatastannirdiśati- iyaṃ pṛthivī pūpā /
GV05brupsb1u:2462: svayameva nirvacanamāha- iyaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ puṣyati yadidaṃ kiñca //13//
GV05brupsb1u:2466: tad etat kṣatrasya kṣatraṃ yad dharmaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2470: yo vai sa dharmaḥ satyaṃ vai tat |
GV05brupsb1u:2471: tasmāt satyaṃ vadantam āhur dharmaṃ vadatīti |
GV05brupsb1u:2473: etad dhy evaitad ubhayaṃ bhavati || BrhUp_1,4.14 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2474: BrhUpBh_1,4.14 sa caturaḥ sṛṣṭvāpi varṇānnaiva vyabhavat,
GV05brupsb1u:2476: tacchreyorūpamatyasṛjata, kiṃ tat? dharmam;tadetacchreyorūpaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ kṣatrasya kṣatraṃ kṣatrasyāpi niyantṛ, ugrādapyugram, yaddharmo yo dharmaḥ;tasmātkṣatrasyāpi niyantṛtvāddharmātparaṃ nāsti;tena hi niyamyante sarve /
GV05brupsb1u:2478: balavattaramapyāśaṃsate kāmayate jetuṃ dharmeṇa balena;yathā loke rājñā sarvabalavattamenāpi kuṭumbikaḥ; evam;tasmātsiddhaṃ dharmasya sarvabalavattaratvātsarvaniyantṛtvam /
GV05brupsb1u:2479: yo vai sa dharmo vyavahāralakṣaṇo laukikairvyavahriyamāṇaḥ satyaṃ vai tat;satyamiti yathāstrārthatā;sa evānuṣṭhīyamāno dharmanāmā bhavati,
GV05brupsb1u:2481: yasmādevaṃ tasmātsatyaṃ yathāśāstraṃ vadantaṃ vyavahārakāla āhuḥ samīpasthā ubhayavivekajñāḥ- dharma vadatīti, prasiddhaṃ laukikaṃ nyāyaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2483: tathā viparyayeṇa dharma vā laukikaṃ vyavahāraṃ vadantamāhuḥ- satyaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2486: tasmātsa dharmo jñānānuṣṭānalakṣaṇaḥ śāstrajñānanitarāṃśca sarvāneva niyamayati /
GV05brupsb1u:2492: tad etad brahma kṣatraṃ viṭ śūdraḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2493: tad agninaiva deveṣu brahmābhavad brāhmaṇo manuṣyeṣu, kṣatriyeṇa
GV05brupsb1u:2495: tasmād agnāv eva deveṣu lokam icchante brāhmaṇe manuṣyeṣu |
GV05brupsb1u:2497: atha yo ha vā asmāl lokāt svaṃ lokam adṛṣṭvā praiti sa enam avidito na bhunakti yathā vedo vānanūkto 'nyad vā karmākṛtam |
GV05brupsb1u:2498: yadi ha vā apy anevaṃvin mahatpuṇyaṃ karma karoti tad dhāsyāntataḥ kṣīyata eva |
GV05brupsb1u:2500: sa ya ātmānam eva lokam upāste na hāsya karma kṣīyate |
GV05brupsb1u:2501: asmād dhy evātmano yadyat kāmayate tattat sṛjate || BrhUp_1,4.15 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2502: BrhUpBh_1,4.15 tadetaccāturvarṇyaṃ sṛṣṭam - brahma kṣatraṃ viṭśūdra
GV05brupsb1u:2503: iti;uttarārthaṃ upasaṃhāraḥ yattatsraṣṭṛ brahma, tadagninaivanānyena rūpeṇa deveṣu brahma, brāhmaṇajātirabhavat /
GV05brupsb1u:2504: brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇasvarūpeṇa manuṣyeṣu brahmābhavat, itareṣu varṇeṣu vikārāntaraṃ prāpya, kṣatriyeṇa kṣatriyo 'bhavadindrādidevatādhiṣṭhitaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2506: yasmātkṣatrādiṣu vikārāpannam, agnau brāhmaṇa e cāvikṛtaṃ sraṣṭṛ brahma,
GV05brupsb1u:2507: tasmādagnāveva deveṣu devānāṃ madhye lokaṃ karmaphalam,
GV05brupsb1u:2510: tasmāt tasminnagnau karma kṛtvā tatphalaṃ prārthayanta ityetadupapannam /
GV05brupsb1u:2520: yasmādetābhyāṃ hi brāhmaṇāgnirūpābhyāṃ karmakartradhikaraṇarūpābhyāṃ yatsraṣṭṛ brahma sākṣādabhavat
GV05brupsb1u:2521: atra tu paramātmalokamagnau brāhmaṇe cecchantīti kecit /
GV05brupsb1u:2523: pareṇa ca viśeṣaṇāt;yadi hyatra lokaśabdena para evātmocyeta, pareṇa viśeṣaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt'svaṃ lokamadṛṣṭvā'iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2528: brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā varṇāḥ karmārtham;tacca karma dharmākhyaṃ sarvāneva
GV05brupsb1u:2530: tasmāttenaiva cetkarmaṇā svo lokaḥ paramātmākhyo 'vidito 'pi prāpyate, kiṃ tasyaiva padanīyatvena kriyata ityata āha-atheti
GV05brupsb1u:2531: pūrvapakṣavinivṛttyarthaḥ;yaḥ kaścit, ha vai asmātsaṃsārikāmakarmahetukādagnyadhīnakarmābhimānatayā vā brāhmaṇajātimātrakarmābhimānatayā vā āgantukādasvabhūtāllokāt, svaṃ lokamātmākhyam ātmatvenāvyabhicāritvāt, adṛṣṭā -'ahaṃ brahmāsmi'iti,
GV05brupsb1u:2532: praiti mriyate;sa yadyapi svo lokaḥ, avidito 'vidyayā vyavahito 'sva
GV05brupsb1u:2533: ivājñātaḥ enam - saṅkhyāpūraṇa iva laukika ātmānam na bhunakti na pālayati śokamohabhayādidoṣāpanayena
GV05brupsb1u:2534: yathā ca loke vedo 'nanukto 'nadhītaḥ karmādyavabodhakatvena na bhunakti,
GV05brupsb1u:2535: anyadvā laukikaṃ kṛṣyādi karmākṛtaṃ svātmanānabhivyañjitam ātmīyaphalapradānena na bhunakti, evamātmā svo lokaḥ svenaiva nityātmasvarūpeṇānabhivyañjito 'vidyādi prahāṇena na bhunaktyeva nanu kiṃ svalokadarśananimittaparipālanena? karmaṇaḥ phalaprāptidhrauvyāt,
GV05brupsb1u:2536: iṣṭaphalanimittasya ca karmaṇo bāhulyāt, tannimittaṃ pālanamakṣayaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GV05brupsb1u:2537: tanna, kṛtasya kṣayavattvāt;ityetadāha - yadiha vai saṃsāre
GV05brupsb1u:2539: avidvān, mahadbahu aśvamedhādi puṇyaṃ karma iṣṭaphalameva nairantaryeṇa
GV05brupsb1u:2544: ata ātmānameva svaṃ lokam -'ātmānam'iti'svaṃ lokam'ityasminnarthe, svaṃ lokamiti prakṛtatvāt, iha ca svaśabdasyāprayogāt - upāsīta /
GV05brupsb1u:2545: sa ya ātmānameva lokamupāste, tasya kim? ityucyate - na hāsya karma
GV05brupsb1u:2547: yathāviduṣaḥ karmakṣayalakṣaṇaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhaṃ santatameva,na tathā tadasya vidyata ityarthaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:2548: “mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiñcana”iti yadvat /
GV05brupsb1u:2549: svātmalokopāsakasya viduṣo vidyāsaṃyogātkarmaiva na kṣīyata ityapare varṣayanti /
GV05brupsb1u:2550: lokaśabdārthaṃ ca karmasamavāyinaṃ dvidhā parikalpayanti kila eko vyākṛtāvasthā karmāśrayo loko hairaṇyagarbhākhyaḥ, taṃ karmasamavāyinaṃ lokaṃ vyākṛtaṃ paricchinnaṃ ya upāste, tasya kila paricchinnaṃ ya upāste,
GV05brupsb1u:2555: bhavatīyaṃ śobhanā kalpanā na tu śrautī /
GV05brupsb1u:2557: svaṃ lokamiti prastutya svaśabdaṃ vihāyātmaśabdaprakṣepeṇa punastasyaiva pratinirdeśādātmānameva lokamupāsīteti /
GV05brupsb1u:2559: pareṇa ca kevalavidyāviṣayeṇa viśeṣaṇāt -”kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no
GV05brupsb1u:2562: putrakarmāparavidyākṛtebhyo hi lokebhyo viśinaṣṭi'ayamātmā no lokaḥ'iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2563: “na hāsya kenacana karmaṇā loko mīyata eṣo 'sya paramo lokaḥ”iti ca /
GV05brupsb1u:2564: taiḥ saviśeṣaṇairasyaikavākyatā yuktā, ihāpi svaṃ lokamiti
GV05brupsb1u:2566: asmātkāmayata ityayuktamiti cet - iha svo lokaḥ paramātmā, tadupāsanātsa eva bhavatīti sthite, yadyatkāmayate tattadasmādātmanaḥ sṛjata ithi tadātmaprāptivyatirekeṇa phalavacanamayuktamiti cet,
GV05brupsb1u:2572: yadi hi para evātmā sampadyate tadā yuktaḥ asmāddhyevātmanaḥ ityātmaśabdaprayogaḥ, svasmādeva prakṛtādātmano lokādityevamarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2573: anyathā'avyākṛtāvasthātkarmaṇo lokāt'iti saviśeṣaṇamavakṣyāt prakṛtaparamātmalokavyāvṛttaye vyākṛtāvasthāvyāvṛttaye ca /
GV05brupsb1u:2576: atrāvidvān varṇāśramādyabhimāno dharmeṇa niyamyamāno devādikarmakartavyatayā paśuvatparatantra ityuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:2577: kāni punastāni karmāṇi yatkartavyatayā paśuvatparatantro bhavati? ke vā te
GV05brupsb1u:2578: devādayo yeṣāṃ karmabhiḥ paśuvadupakaroti? iti tadubhayaṃ prapañcayati-
GV05brupsb1u:2580: atho ayaṃ vā ātmā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2581: sa yaj juhoti yad yajate tena devānāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2583: atha yat pitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti yat prajām icchate tena pitṝṇām |
GV05brupsb1u:2584: atha yan manuṣyān vāsayate yad ebhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti tena manuṣyāṇām |
GV05brupsb1u:2585: atha yat paśubhyas tṛṇodakaṃ vindati tena paśūnām |
GV05brupsb1u:2586: yad asya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsy ā pipīlikābhya upajīvanti tena teṣāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2587: yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭim icchet |
GV05brupsb1u:2588: evaṃ haivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāny ariṣṭim icchanti |
GV05brupsb1u:2589: tad vā etad viditaṃ mīmāṃsitam || BrhUp_1,4.16 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2593: kaiḥ punaḥ karmaviśeṣairupakurvan keṣāṃ bhūtaviśeṣāṇāṃ lokaḥ? ityucyate -
GV05brupsb1u:2594: sa gṛhī yajjuhoti yadyajate, yāgo devatāmuddiśya svatvaparityāgaḥ, sa eva parityāgaḥ, sa eva āsecanādhiko homaḥ tena homayāgalakṣaṇena
GV05brupsb1u:2595: karmaṇāvaśyakartavyatvena devānāṃ paśuvatparatantratvena pratibaddha iti lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2597: atha yatpitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti prayacchati piṇḍodakādi, yacca prajāmicchati prajārthamudyamaṃ karoti - icchā cotpattyupalakṣaṇārthā - prajāṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2598: cotpādayatītyarthaḥ, tena karmaṇāvaśyakartavyatvena pitṛṇāṃ bhogyatvena paratantro lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2599: atha yanmanuṣyānvāsayate gṛhe, yacca tebhyo vasadbhyo 'vasadbhyo vā arthibhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti, tena manuṣyāṇām;atha yatpaśubhyastṛṇodakaṃ vindati lambhayati, tena paśūnām;yadasya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsi ca pipīlikābhiḥ saha kaṇabalibhāṇḍakṣālanādyupajīvanti, tena teṣāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2600: yasmādayametāni karmāṇi kurvannupakaroti devādibhyaḥ, tasmādyathā ha vai
GV05brupsb1u:2601: loke svāpya lokāya svasmai dehāyāriṣṭamavināśaṃ svatvabhāvāpracyutimicchet svatvabhāvapracyutibhayātpoṣaṇarakṣaṇādibhiḥ sarvataḥ paripālayet, evaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2602: haivaṃvide'sarvabhūtabhogyo 'hamanena prakāreṇa mayā avaśyamṛṇivatpratikartavyam'ityevamātmānaṃ parikalpitavate sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV05brupsb1u:2603: devādīni yathoktāni ariṣṭimavināśamicchanti svatvāpracyutyai sarvataḥ saṃrakṣanti kuṭumbina iva paśūn -”tasmādeṣāṃ tanna priyam”ityuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:2604: tadvā etattadetadyathoktānāṃ karmaṇām ṛṇavadavaśyakartavyatvaṃ pañcamahāyajñaprakaraṇe viditaṃ kartavyatayā mīmāṃsitaṃ vicāritaṃ cāvadānaprakaraṇe //16//
GV05brupsb1u:2606: kenāyaṃ kāritaḥ karmavandhanādhikāre 'vaśa iva pravartate, na punastadvimokṣṇopāye vidyādhikāra iti nanūktaṃ devā rakṣantīti /
GV05brupsb1u:2609: na tu sāmānyaṃ puruṣamātraṃ viśiṣṭādhikārānārūḍham;tasmādbhavitavyaṃ tena,
GV05brupsb1u:2610: yena prerito 'vaśa eva bahirmukho bhavati svasmāllokāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2612: sāpi naiva pravartikā;vastusvarūpāvarṇātmikā hi sā;pravartakabījatvaṃ tu pratipadyate 'ndhatvamiva gartādipatanapravṛttihetuḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2613: evaṃ tarhyucyatāṃ kiṃ tad yatpravṛttiheturiti? tadihābhidhīyate - eṣaṇā kāmaḥ saḥ ,'svābhāvikyāmavidyāyāṃ vartamānā bālāḥ parācaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:2614: kāmānanuyanti'iti kāṭhakaśrutau, smṛtau ca -”kāma eṣa krodha eṣaḥ”(gītā 3
GV05brupsb1u:2615: / 37) ityādi, mānave ca sarvā pravṛttiḥ kāmahetukyeveti /
GV05brupsb1u:2616: sa eṣor'thaḥ savistaraḥ pradarśyata iha ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ -
GV05brupsb1u:2619: so 'kāmayata jāyā me syād atha prajāyeya |
GV05brupsb1u:2620: atha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti |
GV05brupsb1u:2623: tasmād apy etarhy ekākī kāmayate -- jāyā me syād atha prajāyeyātha vittaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2625: sa yāvad apy eteṣām ekaikaṃ na prāpnoty akṛtsna eva tāvan manyate |
GV05brupsb1u:2639: pāṅktam idaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiñca |
GV05brupsb1u:2640: tad idaṃ sarvam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.17 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2643: prāgdārasambandhāt,ātmetyabhidhīyate;tasmādātmanaḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ kāmyamānaṃ jāyādibhedarūpaṃ nāsīt;sa evaika āsīt - jāyādyeṣaṇābījabhūtā vidyāvāneka evāsīt /
GV05brupsb1u:2644: svābhāvikyā svātmani kartrādikārakakriyāphalātmakatādhyāropalakṣaṇayā avidyāvāsanayā vāsitaḥ so 'kāmayata kāmitavān /
GV05brupsb1u:2645: katham? jāyā karmādhikārahetubhūtā me mama kartuḥ syāt;tayā

GV05brupsb1u:2676: - tasyo tasyākṛtsnatvabhimāninaḥ kṛtsnatā iyam evaṃ bhavati katham? ayaṃ kāryakaraṇasaṅghātaḥ pravibhajyate;tatra mano 'nuvṛtti hi itaratsarvaṃ kāryakaraṇajñātamiti manaḥ pradhānatvājātmevātmā yathā jāyādīnāṃ kuṭumbapatirātmeva tadanukāritvāñjāyādi

GV05brupsb1u:2697: kathaṃ punarasya pañcatvasampattimātreṇa yajñatvam? ucyate - yasmādbāhyo
GV05brupsb1u:2698: 'pi yajñaḥ paśupuruṣasādhyaḥ, sa ca paśuḥ puruṣaśca pāṅkta eva

GV05brupsb1u:2702: kiṃ bahunā? pāṅktamidaṃ sarvaṃ karmasādhanaṃ phalaṃ ca, yadidaṃ kiñca yatkiñcididaṃ sarvam

GV05brupsb1u:2707: sa varṇāśramābhimānaḥ karmakartavyatayā niyato juhotyādikarmabhiḥ kāmaprayukto devādīnāmupakurvansarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ loka ityuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:2708: yathā ca svakarmabhirekaikena sarvairbhūtairasau loko bhojyatvena sṛṣṭaḥ,

GV05brupsb1u:2712: etadeva ca vidyāprakaraṇe madhuvidyāyāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ -'sarvaṃ sarvasya kāryaṃ madhu'ityātmaikatvavijñānārtham

GV05brupsb1u:2715: eteṣāmannānāṃ saviniyogānāṃ sūtrabhūtāḥ saṅkṣepataḥ prakāśakatvādime mantrāḥ /

GV05brupsb1u:2727: śabdavācye, tayoḥ prakṛtatvāt;netare medhātapasī, aprakaraṇāt;pāṅktaṃ hi karma jāyādisādhanam; 'ya evaṃ veda'iti cānantarameva jñānaṃ prakṛtam;tasmānna prasiddhayormedhātapasorāśaṅkā kāryā;ato yāni saptānnāni jñānakarmabhyāṃ janitavānpitā tāni prakāśayiṣyāma iti vākyaśeṣaḥ tatra mantrāṇāmarthastirohitatvāttprāyeṇa durvijñeyo bhavatīti tadarthavyākhyānāya brāhmaṇaṃ pravartate -
GV05brupsb1u:2730: medhayā hi tapasājanayat pitaikam asya sādhāraṇam iti |
GV05brupsb1u:2731: idam evāsya tat sādhāraṇam annaṃ yad idam adyate |

GV05brupsb1u:2744: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca neti |

GV05brupsb1u:2755: sa hīdam annaṃ dhiyādhiyā janayate karmabhiḥ |

GV05brupsb1u:2766: tatra ca daivaṃ vittaṃ vidyā karma putraśca phalabhūtānāṃ lokānāṃ sādhanaṃ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ pratītyabhihitam, vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca prasiddhameva;tasmādyuktaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2768: eṣaṇā hi phalaviṣayā prasiddhaiva ca loke /
GV05brupsb1u:2773: vivakṣitastu śāstrīya eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo brahmavidyāvidhitsayā tadvairāgyasya vivakṣitatvāt

GV05brupsb1u:2785: kasmātpunaḥ pāpmano na vyāvartate? miśraṃ hyetasmarseṣāṃ hi svaṃ tadapravibhaktaṃ yatprāṇibhirbhujyate

GV05brupsb1u:2813: yadyapi dvitvaṃ hutaprahutayoḥ sambhavati, tathāpi śrautayoreva tu

GV05brupsb1u:2820: paśubhya ekaṃ prāyacchaditi - yatpaśubhya ekaṃ punastadannam? tatpayaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2821: kathaṃ punaravagamyate paśavo 'syānnasya svāminaḥ? ityata āha - payo hyagre prathamaṃ yasmānmanuṣyāśca paśavaśca payaḥ evopajīvantīti /

GV05brupsb1u:2824: tasmātkumāraṃ bālaṃ jātaṃ ghṛtaṃ vā traivarṇikā jātakarmaṇi jātarūpasaṃyuktaṃ pratilehayanti paścāt pāyayanti /
GV05brupsb1u:2826: atha vatsaṃ jātamāhuḥ'kiyatpramāṇo vatsaḥ'? ityevaṃ pṛṣṭā- santo 'tṛṇāda iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2828: nādyāpi tṛṇamatti, atīva bālaḥ, payasaivādyāpi vartata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2829: yaccāgre jātakarmādau ghṛtamupajīvanti, yaccetare paya eva, tatsarvathāpi paya evopajīvanti;ghṛtasyāpi payovikāratvātpayastvameva kasmātpunaḥ saptamaṃ satpaśvannaṃ caturthatvena vyākhyāyate? karmasādhanatvāt /

GV05brupsb1u:2835: sukhaṃ hi nairantaryeṇa vyākhyātu śakyante 'nnāni vyākhyātāni ca sukhaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2837: tasminsarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca netyasya kor'thaḥ? ityucyate
GV05brupsb1u:2838: - tasminpaśvanne payasi sarvamadhyātmādhibhūtādhidaivalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagatpratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti prāṇaveṣṭāvadyacca na sthānaraṃ śailādi /

GV05brupsb1u:2845: jayatīti, saṃvatsareṇa kila trīṇi ṣaṣṭiśatānyāhutīnāṃ sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśceti yājuṣmatīriṣṭakā abhisampadyamānāḥ saṃvatsarasya cāhorātrāṇi,

GV05brupsb1u:2848: ityevaṃ brāhmaṇavādā āhuḥ, na tathā vidyānna tathā draṣṭavyam;yadahareva
GV05brupsb1u:2850: evaṃ vidvānsan, yaduktam - payasi hīdaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ paya āhutivipariṇāmātmakatvātsarvasyeti, tadekenaivāhvā jagadātmatvaṃ pratipadyate;taducyate - apajayati punarmṛtyuṃ punarmaraṇam,
GV05brupsb1u:2851: sakṛnmṛtvāviddhāñcharīreṇa viyujya sarvātmā bhavati na punarmaraṇāya paricchinnaṃ śarīraṃ gṛhṇātītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2852: kaḥ punarhetuḥ sarvātmāptyā mṛtyumapajayati? ityucyate - sarvaṃ samastaṃ hi yasmāddevebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'nnādyamannameva tadādyaṃ ca sāyaṃprātarāhutiprakṣepeṇa prayacchati /
GV05brupsb1u:2853: tadyuktaṃ sarvamāhutimayamātmānaṃ kṛtvā sarvadevānnarūpeṇa sarvairdevairekātmabhāvaṃ gatvā sarvadevamayo bhūtvā punarna mriyata iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2855: tadaikṣata na vai tapasyānantyamasti, hantāhaṃ bhūteṣvātmānaṃ juhavāni
GV05brupsb1u:2856: bhūtāni cātmanīti, tatsarveṣu bhūteṣvātmānaṃ hutvā bhūtāni cātmani sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyagādhipatyaṃ paryet”iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2858: yadā pitrā annāni sṛṣṭvā sapta pṛthakpṛthagbhoktṛbhiradyagānāni -
GV05brupsb1u:2862: bhavitavyaṃ cākṣayakāraṇena;tasmātkasmātpunastāni na kṣīyanta iti praśnaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:2864: yathāsau pūrvamannānāṃ sraṣṭāsītpitā medhayā jāyādisambandhena ca pāṅktakarmaṇā bhoktā ca, tathā yebhyo dattānyannāni te 'pi teṣāmannānāṃ bhoktāro 'pi santaḥ pitara eva, medhayā tapasā ca yato janayanti tānyannāni /

GV05brupsb1u:2867: utpādayati dhiyā dhiyā tattatkālabhāvinyā tayā tayā prajñayā, karmabhiśca vāṅmanaḥkāyaveṣṭitaiḥ yadyadi ha yadyetatsaptavidhamannamuktaṃ kṣaṇamātramapi na kuryātprajñayā karmabhiśca, tato vicchidyeta bhujyamānatvātsātatyena kṣīyeta ha /

GV05brupsb1u:3113: vidyayā devaloko na putreṇa nāpi karmaṇā /

GV05brupsb1u:3116: evaṃ sādhyalokatrayaphalabhedena viniyuktāni putrakarmavidyākhyāni trīṇi sādhanāni /
GV05brupsb1u:3120: putrasya tvakriyātmakatvātkena prakāreṇa lokajayahetutvamiti na jñāyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3124: yadā praiṣyan manyate 'tha putram āha -- tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ loka iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3126: sa putraḥ pratyāhāhaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'ham loka iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3127: yad vai kiñcānūktaṃ tasya sarvasya brahmety ekatā |
GV05brupsb1u:3128: ye vai ke ca yajñās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yajña ity ekatā |
GV05brupsb1u:3129: ye vai ke ca lokās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ity ekatā |
GV05brupsb1u:3131: etan mā sarvaṃ sann ayam ito bhunajad iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3134: sa yadaivaṃvid asmāl lokāt praity athaibhir eva prāṇaiḥ saha putram āviśati |
GV05brupsb1u:3135: sa yady anena kiñcid akṣṇayā kṛtaṃ bhavati tasmād enaṃ sarvasmāt putro muñcati tasmāt putro nāma |
GV05brupsb1u:3137: athainam ete devāḥ prāṇā amṛtā āviśanti || BrhUp_1,5.17 ||
GV05brupsb1u:3138: BrhUpBh_1,5.17 sampratiḥ sampradānam;samprattiriti vakṣyamāṇasya karmaṇo nāmadheyam /
GV05brupsb1u:3139: putro hi svātmavyāpārasampradānaṃ karotyanena prakāreṇa pitā, tena samprattisaṃjñakamidaṃ karma /
GV05brupsb1u:3140: tatkasminkāle kartavyam? ityāha - sa pitā yadā yasmin kāle praiṣyan
GV05brupsb1u:3141: mariṣyan mariṣyāmītyapariṣṭādidarśanena manyate, atha tadā putramāhūyāha -
GV05brupsb1u:3142: tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ loka iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3143: sa evamuktaḥ putraḥ pratyāha;sa tu pūrvamevānuśiṣṭo jānāti
GV05brupsb1u:3144: mayaitatkartavyamiti, tenāha - ahaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'haṃ loka ithi /
GV05brupsb1u:3147: yadvai kiñca yatkiñcāvaśiṣṭamanūktamadhītamanadhītaṃ ca, tasya sarvasyaiva brahmetyetasminpade ekatā ekatvam yo 'dhyayanavyāpāro mama kartavya āsīdetāvantaṃ kālaṃ vedaviṣayaḥ, sa ita ūrdhvaṃ tvaṃ brahma tvatkartṛko
GV05brupsb1u:3149: tathā ye vai ke ca yajñā anuṣṭheyāḥ santo mayā anuṣṭhitāścānanuṣṭhitāśca,
GV05brupsb1u:3150: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yajña ityetasminpade ekataikatvam, matkartṛkā yajñā ya
GV05brupsb1u:3151: āsan, te ita ūrdhvaṃ tvaṃ yajñaḥ - tvatkartṛkā bhavantvityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3152: ye vai ke ca lokā mayā jetavyāḥ santo jitā ajitāśca, teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka
GV05brupsb1u:3154: ita ūrdhvaṃ mayādhyayanayajñalokajayakartavyakratustvayi samarpitaḥ, ahaṃ tu mukto 'smi kartavyatābandhanaviṣayātkratoḥ
GV05brupsb1u:3156: tatremaṃ piturabhiprāyaṃ manvānā ācaṣṭa śrutiḥ - etāvadetatparimāṇaṃ vai idaṃ sarvaṃ yadgṛhiṇā kartavyam, yaduta vedā adhyetavyāḥ, yajñā yaṣṭavyāḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3158: etanmā sarvaṃ sannayam - sarvaṃ hīmaṃ bhāraṃ madadhīnaṃ matto 'pacchidya
GV05brupsb1u:3161: yasmādevaṃ sampannaḥ putraḥ pitaram asmāllokātkartavyatābandhanato mocayiṣyati, tasmātputramanuśiṣṭaṃ lokyaṃ lokahitaṃ piturāhurbrāhmaṇāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3162: ata eva hyenaṃ putramanuśāsati, lokyo 'yaṃ naḥ syāditi, pitaraḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3168: ahamasmyanantā vāṅmanaḥprāṇā adhyātmādibhedavistārā ityevaṃ bhāvito hi pitā /
GV05brupsb1u:3169: tasmāttatprāṇānuvṛttitvaṃ piturbhavatīti yuktamuktam - ebhireva prāṇaiḥ saha putramāviśatīt;sarveṣāṃ hyasāvātmā bhavati putrasya ca /
GV05brupsb1u:3170: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yasya piturevamanuśiṣṭaḥ putro bhavati so 'sminneva
GV05brupsb1u:3171: loke vartate putrarūpeṇa, naiva mṛto mantavya ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3172: tathā ca śrutyantare -”so 'syāyamitara ātmā puṇyebhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:3175: athedānīṃ putranirvacanamāha - sa putro yadi kadācidanena pitrā akṣṇyā
GV05brupsb1u:3177: kartavyatārūpātpitrā akṛtāt sarvasmāllokaprāptipratibandharūpātputro muñcati mocayati tatsarvaṃ svayamanutiṣṭhanpūrayitvā /
GV05brupsb1u:3178: tasmātpūraṇena trāyate sa pitaraṃ yasmāttasmātputro nāma /
GV05brupsb1u:3179: idaṃ tatputrasya putratvaṃ yatpituśchidraṃ pūrayitvā trāyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3180: sa pitaivaṃvidhena putreṇa mṛto 'pi sannamṛto 'sminneva loke
GV05brupsb1u:3181: pratitiṣṭhati, evamasau pitā putreṇemaṃ manuṣyalokaṃ jayati /
GV05brupsb1u:3182: na tathā vidyākarmabhyāṃ devalokapitṛlokau svarūpalābhasattāmātreṇa;na hi vidyākarmaṇī svarūpalābhavyatirekeṇa putravadvyāpārāntarāpekṣayā lokajayahetutvaṃ pratipadyete /
GV05brupsb1u:3183: atha kṛtasamprattikaṃ pitaramenamete vāgādayaḥ prāṇā daivā hairaṇyagarbhā amṛtā amaraṇadharmāṇa āviśanti kathamiti vakṣyati pṛthivyai cainamityādi /
GV05brupsb1u:3184: evaṃ putrakarmāparavidyānāṃ manuṣyalokapitṛlokadeva lokasādhyārthatā pradarśitā śrutyā svayameva
GV05brupsb1u:3190: vyāvṛttireva;tasmātputrakarmāparavidyābhiḥ samucityānuṣṭhitābhistribhya etebhyo lokebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ paramātmavijñānena mokṣamadhigacchatīti
GV05brupsb1u:3192: teṣāmapi mukhāpidhānāyeyameva śrutiruttarā kṛtasamprattikasya putriṇaḥ karmiṇaḥ tryannātmavidyāvidaḥ, phalapradarśanāya pravṛttā /
GV05brupsb1u:3193: na cedameva phalaṃ mokṣaphalamiti śakyaṃ, vaktum, tryannasambandhāt,
GV05brupsb1u:3198: na cedameva sādhanatrayaṃ saṃhataṃ satkasyacinmokṣārthaṃ kasyacit tryannātmaphalamityasmādeva vākyādavagantu śakyam, putrādisādhanānāṃ tryannātmaphaladarśanenaivopakṣīṇatvād vākyasya /
GV05brupsb1u:3200: pṛthivyai cainam agneś ca daivī vāg āviśati |
GV05brupsb1u:3201: sā vai daivī vāg yayā yad yad eva vadati tat tad bhavati || BrhUp_1,5.18
GV05brupsb1u:3202: BrhUpBh_1,5.18 pṛthivyai pṛthivyāḥ ca enam agneśca daivī adhidaivātmikā vāgenaṃ kṛtasamprattikamāviśati
GV05brupsb1u:3203: sarveṣāṃ hi vāca upādānabhūtā daivī vākpṛthivyagnilakṣaṇā, sā hyādhyātmikāsaṅgādidoṣairniruddhā
GV05brupsb1u:3206: sā ca daivī vāganṛtādidoṣarahitā śuddhā, yayā vācā daivyā yadyadeva ātmane parasmai vā vadati tattadā bhavati, amoghā apratibaddhā asya
GV05brupsb1u:3210: divaś cainam ādityāc ca daivaṃ mana āviśati |
GV05brupsb1u:3211: tad vai daivaṃ mano yenānandy eva bhavaty atho na śocati || BrhUp_1,5.19
GV05brupsb1u:3212: BrhUpBh_1,5.19 divaścainamādityācca daivaṃ mana āviśati - tacca daivaṃ manaḥ;svabhāvanirmalatvāt;yena manasā asau ānandyeva bhavati sukhyeva bhavati;atho api na śocati, śokādinimittāsaṃyogāti tathā -
GV05brupsb1u:3214: adbhyaś cainaṃ candramasaś ca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati |
GV05brupsb1u:3215: sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati |
GV05brupsb1u:3216: sa eṣa evaṃvit sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmā bhavati |
GV05brupsb1u:3218: yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanty evaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanti |
GV05brupsb1u:3219: yad u kiñcemāḥ prajāḥ śocanty amaivāsāṃ tad bhavati |
GV05brupsb1u:3221: na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati || BrhUp_1,5.20 ||
GV05brupsb1u:3222: BrhUpBh_1,5.20 adbhayaścainaṃ candramasaśca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati /
GV05brupsb1u:3223: sa vai daivaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃllakṣaṇaḥ? ityucyate-yaḥ sañcaran prāṇibhedeṣva sañcaransamaṣṭivya ṣṭirūpeṇa--athavā sañcarana jaṅgameṣu asañcaransthāvareṣu, na vyathate na duḥkhanimittena bhayena yuḍyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3224: athāṃ api na riṣyati na vinaśyati na hiṃsāmāpadyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3225: saḥ--yo yathoktamevaṃ vetti vyannātmadarśanaṃ saḥ-sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prāṇo bhavati, sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mano bhavati, sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ vāgbhavati-ityevaṃ sarvābhūtātmatayā sarvajño bhavatītyarthaḥ;sarvakṛcca /
GV05brupsb1u:3226: tathaipā pūrvasidvā hiraṇyagarbhadevatā evameva nāsya sarvajñatve sarvakṛttave vā kkacitpratighātaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:3228: kiñca yathaitāṃd diraṇyagarbhadevatāmijyādibhiḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti pālayanti pūjyanti, evaṃ ha evaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti-ijyādilakṣaṇāṃ
GV05brupsb1u:3230: athedamāśaṅkayate-sarvaprāṇināmātmā bhavatītyuttkam, tasya ca sarvaprāṇikāryakaraṇātmatve sarvaprāṇisukhaduḥkhaiḥ sambadhyeteti /
GV05brupsb1u:3233: asya tu sarvātmano ya ākruśyate yaścākrośati yatorātmatvabudviviśeṣābhāvānna tannimittaṃ duḥkhamupapadyate
GV05brupsb1u:3234: maraṇaduḥkhavacca nimittābhāvāt yathā hi kasmiṃścinmṛte kasyacid
GV05brupsb1u:3238: tadetaducyate-yadu kiñcayat kiñca imāḥ prajāḥ śocantyamaiva sahaiva
GV05brupsb1u:3239: prajābhistacchokādinimittaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃyuktaṃ bhavatyāsāṃ prajānāṃ paricchinnabudvijanitatvāt
GV05brupsb1u:3240: sarvātmanastu kena saha kiṃ saṃyukta bhavedviyukta vā? amuṃ tu prājāpatye
GV05brupsb1u:3242: hi tena puṇyaṃ kṛtam;tena tatphalameva gacchati /
GV05brupsb1u:3243: na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati, pāpaphalasyāvasarābhāvāt pāpaphalaṃ duḥkha
GV05brupsb1u:3247: kimevameva pratipattavyam? kiṃ vā vicāryamāṇe kaścidviśeṣo vratamupāsanaṃ prati pratitapattuṃ śakyate? ityucyate-
GV05brupsb1u:3262: athemam eva nāpnot yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:3264: ayaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati |
GV05brupsb1u:3268: tena ha vāva tat kulam ācakṣate yasmin kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brupsb1u:3270: anuśuṣya haivāntato mriyata ity adhyātmam || BrhUp_1,5.21 ||
GV05brupsb1u:3272: eṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ kasya karma vratatvena dhārayitavyamiti mīmāṃsā pravartate /
GV05brupsb1u:3273: tatra prajāpatirha - haśabdaḥ kilārthe - prajāpatiḥ kila prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā karmāṇi karaṇāni vāgādīni - karmāthāni hi tānīti karmāṇītyucyante - sasṛje sṛṣṭavānvāgādīni karaṇānītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3274: tāni punaḥ sṛṣṭānyanyonyena itaretaramaspardhanta spardhāṃ saṃgharṣaṃ cakruḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3275: katham? vadiṣyāmyeva svavyāpārādvadanādanuparataivāhaṃ syāmiti vāgvrataṃ dadhre dhṛtavatī - yadyanyo 'pi matsamo 'sti svavyāpārādanuparantuṃ
GV05brupsb1u:3277: tathā drakṣyāmyahamiti cakṣuḥ, śroṣyāmyahamiti śrotram;evamanyāni karmāṇi karaṇāni yathākarma - yadyadyasya karma yathākarma /
GV05brupsb1u:3278: tāni karaṇāni mṛtyurmārakaḥ śramaḥ śramarūpī bhūtvā upayeme sañjagrāha /
GV05brupsb1u:3279: katham? tāni karaṇāni svavyāpāre pravṛttānyāpnot, śramarūpeṇātmānaṃ darśitavān /
GV05brupsb1u:3280: āptvā ca tānyavārundha avarodhaṃ kṛtavānmṛtyuḥ - svakarmabhyaḥ pracyāvitavānityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3281: tasmādadyatve 'pi vadane svakarmaṇi pravṛttā vāk śrāmyatvena śramarūpiṇā
GV05brupsb1u:3284: athemameva mukhyaṃ prāṇaṃ nāpnonna prāptavānmṛtyuḥ śramarūpī, yo 'yaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:3287: tānītarāṇi karaṇāni taṃ jñātuṃ dadhrire dhṛtavanti manaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3288: ayaṃ vai no 'smākaṃ madhye śreṣṭhaḥ praśasyatamo 'bhyadhikaḥ, yasmādyaḥ sañcaraṃścāsañcaraṃśca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati - hantedānīmasyaiva prāṇasya sarve vayaṃ rūpamasāma prāṇamātmatvena pratipadyemahi - evaṃ viniścitya te etasyaiva sarve rūpamabhavan;prāṇarūpamevātmatvena
GV05brupsb1u:3289: pratipannāḥ, prāṇavratameva dadhrire - asmadvratāni na mṛtyorvāraṇāya
GV05brupsb1u:3291: yasmātprāṇena rūpeṇa rūpavantītarāṇi karaṇāni calanātmanā svena ca
GV05brupsb1u:3296: ya evaṃ prāṇātmatāṃ sarvakaraṇānāṃ vetti prāṇaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ ca, tena ha vāva tenaiva viduṣā tatkulamācakṣate laukikāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3297: yasminkule sa vidvāñjāto bhavati tatkulaṃ vidvāñjāto bhavati tatkulaṃ vidvannāmnaiva prathitaṃ bhavatyamuṣyadaṃ kulamiti, yathā tāpatya iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3298: ya evaṃ yathoktaṃ veda vāgādīnāṃ prāṇarūpatāṃ prāṇākhyatvaṃ ca tasyaitatphalam /
GV05brupsb1u:3299: kiñca yaḥ kaścidu haivaṃvidā prāṇātmadarśinā spardhate tatpratipakṣī san,
GV05brupsb1u:3301: anuśuṣya haiva śoṣaṃ gatvaiva antato 'nte mriyate na sahasānupadruto
GV05brupsb1u:3310: sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evam etāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:3311: mlocanti hy anyā devatā na vāyuḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:3314: kasya devatāviśeṣasya vratadhāraṇaṃ śreyaḥ? iti mīmāsyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3318: so 'dhyātmaṃ vāgādīnāmeṣāṃ prāṇo mṛtyunā anāptaḥ svakarmaṇo na pracyāvitaḥ svena prāṇavratenābhagnavrato yathā;evametāsāmagnyādīnāṃ devatānāṃ vāyurapi /
GV05brupsb1u:3319: mlocantyastaṃ yanti svakarmebhya uparamante - yathādhyātmaṃ vāgādayo 'nyā
GV05brupsb1u:3320: devatā agnyādyāḥ, na vāyurastaṃ yāti - yathā madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ, ataḥ saiṣā anastamitā devatā yadvāyuryo 'yaṃ vāyuḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3321: evamadhyātmamadhidaivaṃ ca mīmāṃsitvā nirdhāritam - prāṇavāyyvātmano vratamabhagnamiti //22//
GV05brupsb1u:3324: yataś codeti sūryo 'staṃ yatra ca gacchatīti |
GV05brupsb1u:3325: prāṇād vā eṣa udeti prāṇe 'stam eti |
GV05brupsb1u:3326: taṃ devāś cakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3327: yad vā ete 'murhy adhriyanta tad evāpy adya kurvanti |
GV05brupsb1u:3328: tasmād ekam eva vrataṃ caret prāṇyāc caivāpānyāc ca |
GV05brupsb1u:3329: nen mā pāpmā mṛtyur āpnavad iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3330: yady u caret samāpipayiṣet teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati || BrhUp_1,5.23
GV05brupsb1u:3331: BrhUpBh_1,5.23 athaitasyaivārthasya prakāśaka eṣa śloko mantro bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:3332: yataśca yasmādvāyorudetyudgacchati sūryaḥ, adhyātmaṃ ca cakṣurātmanā
GV05brupsb1u:3333: prāṇād astaṃ ca yatra vāyau prāṇe ca gacchatyaparasaṃdhyāsamaye svāpasamaye ca puruṣasya, taṃ devāstaṃ dharmaṃ devāścakrire dhṛtavanto vāgādayo 'gnyādayaśca prāṇavrataṃ ca purā vicārya /
GV05brupsb1u:3334: sa evādyedānīṃ śvo 'pi bhaviṣyatyapi kāle 'nuvartyate 'nuvartiṣyate ca devairityabhiprāyaḥ
GV05brupsb1u:3335: tatremaṃ mantraṃ saṃkṣepato vyācaṣṭa brāhmaṇam - prāṇādvā eṣa sūrya udeti prāṇe 'stameti /
GV05brupsb1u:3336: taṃ devāścakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva ityasya kor'thaḥ? ityucyate -
GV05brupsb1u:3337: yadvai ete vratamamurhi amuṣminkāle vāgādayo 'gnyādayaśca prāṇavrataṃ vāyuvrataṃ cādhriyanta, tadevādyāpi kurvantyanuvartate 'nuvartiṣyante ca /
GV05brupsb1u:3339: yattu vāgādivratamagnyādivrataṃ ca tadbhagnameva, teṣāmastamanakāle svāpakāle ca vāyau prāṇe ca nimsuktidarśanāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3340: athaitadanyatroktam”yadā vai puraṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti prāṇaṃ manaḥ prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥprāṇaṃ śrotraṃ yadā prabudhyate prāṇādevādhi punarjāyanta ityadhyātmamathādhidaivataṃ yadā vā agniranugacchati vāyuṃ
GV05brupsb1u:3341: tarhyanūdvāti yadādityo 'stameti vāyuṃ tarhi praviśati vāyuṃ candramā vāyau diśaḥ pratiṣṭhitā vāyorevādhi punarjāyante”iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3342: yasmāde etadeva vrataṃ vāgādiṣvagnyādiṣu cānugataṃ yadetadvāyośca prāṇasya ca parispandātmakatvaṃ sarvedevairuvartyamānaṃ vratam tasmādanyo
